creator: clm@csse.monash.edu.au
text:
The visible and display properties on text child elements aren't honoured.

Probably will have to add a visible and display property to the TextPaintInfo
class and react to them appropriately in the relevant gvt classes.

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
The Visible part should probably be handled through the TextPaintInfo
class, but display can't be, because for display the text needs to be
relayed out.  The only real thing to do would be to trigger a rebuild
of the string on display change so the no longer displayed text can be
removed from the ACI.
